io.smint.clapi.consumer.integration.core.configuration.impl

Class AuthTokenStorageWithCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.smint.clapi.consumer.integration.core.configuration.impl.AuthTokenStorageWithCache
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAuthTokenStorage, javax.inject.Provider<IAuthTokenModel>

    @Named(value="authTokenStorage")
 @Singleton
public class AuthTokenStorageWithCache
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAuthTokenStorage
    Wraps a IAuthTokenStorage and provides a cache to its retrieved data.

    This instance requires another instance to wrap, which will be queried for data. Hence this instance is following the proxy pattern. It is used internally during synchronization jobs. Therefore its lifetime is very short which will avoid any stale cache. Nevertheless be aware that stale caches could happen.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AuthTokenStorageWithCache(IAuthTokenStorage tokenStorage)
      Create a new facade to another token provider, caching its result for improved performance.

      • AuthTokenStorageWithCache

        @Inject
public AuthTokenStorageWithCache(@Named(value="authTokenPersistentStorage")
                                         IAuthTokenStorage tokenStorage)
        Create a new facade to another token provider, caching its result for improved performance.
        Parameters:
        tokenStorage - the storage to wrap and query for data - must not be null. If available, the DI injects an instance named authTokenPersistentStorage.

        Returns:

      • storeAuthData

        public IAuthTokenStorage storeAuthData(IAuthTokenModel newAuthTokenData)
        Description copied from interface: IAuthTokenStorage
        Stores a new set of OAuth authentication data to be made persistent and retrieved on next call to IAuthTokenStorage.getAuthData().

        The access token should be persisted to the underlaying storage. In case this storage takes a lot of IO and time (eg: database), please make use of CompletableFuture.runAsync(Runnable) and then return this on completion.

        Specified by:
        storeAuthData in interface IAuthTokenStorage
        Parameters:
        newAuthTokenData - new OAuth token data for authorization with Smint.io API server, that need to be made persistent.
        Returns:
        this to support Fluent Interface.
